ops.description: Bank[6][11] = getLastFieldMapId(); // wm does not count
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:1, type:4, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:1, adjust:255});
{ let pos = getEntityPosition({entityId:8}); Bank[2][188] = pos.x; Bank[2][190] = pos.y; Bank[2][192] = pos.z; Bank[2][194] = pos.triangleId; }
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:1, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:30}); // {Cloud}
“I guess we're still in one piece.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:35}); // {Red XIII}
“…Snow in my ear.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:39}); // {Cid}
“I'm too old for this!
Damn!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:36}); // {Yuffie}
“God!
I can't stand it!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:37}); // {Cait Sith}
“I'm a little off.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:40}); // {Cloud}
“So where did we land?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:41}); // {Cloud}
“That didn't seem like
such a big jump…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:45}); // {Tifa}
“Well, we've got a map, right?
Look at the map by pressing
{PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:46}); // {Aeris}
“Hey.
Let's take a look at the map.
Press {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:47}); // {Yuffie}
“We need the map, okay!?
Let's see it with {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:50}); // {Cait Sith}
“Then, let's look at the map.
Just push {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:51}); // {Vincent}
“We should check it on the map.
Press the {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:48}); // {Barret}
“Hey, what's that!?
You just got something, right?
Use {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE} to see it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:52}); // {Cid}
“Quick! The map, the map!
Look at it with {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE}!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:53}); // {Cloud}
“It sure is cold.
We'll freeze
if we stay here any longer.”

dialogStrings:
{Cloud}
“I guess we're still in one piece.”

{Cloud}
“That didn't seem like
such a big jump…”

{Cloud}
“In fact, it feels like
we didn't even jump at all…”

{Tifa}
“Well, we've got a map, right?
Look at the map by pressing
{PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE}.”

{Aeris}
“Hey.
Let's take a look at the map.
Press {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE}.”

{Yuffie}
“We need the map, okay!?
Let's see it with {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE}.”

{Barret}
“Hey, what's that!?
You just got something, right?
Use {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE} to see it.”

{Red XIII}
“All right, let's look at the map.
We use {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE}, right?”

{Cait Sith}
“Then, let's look at the map.
Just push {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE}.”

{Vincent}
“We should check it on the map.
Press the {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE}.”

{Cid}
“Quick! The map, the map!
Look at it with {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE}!”

{Cloud}
“It sure is cold.
We'll freeze
if we stay here any longer.”

{Cloud}
“This is the only place not frozen.”
{CHOICE}Touch it
{CHOICE}Let's go on

“Now,
I don't want to hurt any of you.”

“Yeeew…
You got a lot of nerve trying to
touch me with the same dirty hands
that touched that filthy hot spring!”{PAUSE}“I'll never forgive you.”

Cannot take on any more Materia.
Please discard some Materia.

{Cloud}
“The only way is to cross…”
{CHOICE}That's the way it goes…
{CHOICE}I don't feel like it

{Cloud}
“Face the direction you want to jump in
then press {PURPLE}[OK]{WHITE}.”

{Cloud}
“Looks like trouble.”
{CHOICE}We're outta here!
{CHOICE}Wait a minute!
